name: Chupi Pandi Arcade
description:
Made by Sergio and Laura for our very cool group of friends. Hope you guys like it!

Instructions for the games:

  • Antonio's game: use A-D to move and catch the candy. Avoid brocolli!
  • Cristina's game: use A-D to move, spacebar to climb the candy cane, and S to knock down the ornaments
  • Germán's game: click on the shooting stars to catch them
  • Javi's game: press A-S-D-F in secuence to perform the guitar solo!

Laura and Sergio will exchange games too. Soon to be added ;)
